backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing meeting session management, user profiles, panic events, audit logging, session recordings, and role-based access control with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three requirements for DashboardLayout sidebar visibility, CSS property verification, and responsive behavior testing.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including components, pages, hooks, and their key functionality for authentication, dashboard layout, visualizations, and user interactions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, sidebar, charts, and design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA manifest, favicon, theme color, Inter font preload, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining AXON Remote app metadata, icons, display mode (standalone), orientation (portrait), and theme colors.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for landing, login, dashboard, command center, and other pages, plus React Query, telemetry, error boundary, and session checking.
frontend/src/components/admin/AuditLogVi: Admin component displaying paginated audit logs with filtering by action type, CSV export functionality, and success/failure status badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/SystemHeal: Displays backend system health metrics including cycles balance, heap/stable memory, and query/update call counts with color-coded alerts and refresh functionality.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Biomet: Renders a radar chart showing five biometric stress metrics (executive stress, vocal stability, background noise, packet health, privacy score) with simulated real-time updates.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Emotio: Displays a stacked area chart tracking seven emotions (joy, surprise, fear, disgust, anger, sadness, neutral) over time with toggleable legend items.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Global: Visualizes a world map with four global nodes (San Francisco, London, Tokyo, Bangalore) showing animated pulse effects when nodes become active.
frontend/src/components/analytics/LiveTr: Renders a real-time area chart displaying network traffic data that updates every 3 seconds with a sliding 20-point window.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Meetin: Displays a card for a single meeting log showing title, duration, participant count, sentiment score, cost, and optional summary.
Shows a live-updating meeting cost ticker that increments at ₹12.5/second with pause/resume functionality.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Neural: Displays a terminal-style scrolling log of simulated security events across four categories (ENCRYPT, PACKET, NEURAL, QUANTUM) with timestamps.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Quantu: Displays a dashboard panel showing quantum encryption metrics including key rotation rate, quantum resistance level, lattice crypto status, and post-quantum readiness score with animated indicators and color-coded status displays.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Recent: Renders a table of recent files with columns for name, security level, status, and owner, using color-coded badges to indicate security levels (High/Medium/Low) and file statuses (Active/Archived/Pending).
frontend/src/components/analytics/Sentim: Displays a live-updating area chart tracking vocal stress and emotional tension metrics over time, with data points refreshing every 3 seconds to show sentiment analysis trends.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Speake: Shows a list of identified speakers with their vocal frequency ranges and activity levels, displaying each speaker with a progress bar that updates every 3 seconds to reflect changing activity percentages.
frontend/src/components/analytics/System: Implements a terminal-style scrolling log display showing real-time system events across categories like encryption, authentication, network, and biometric operations with auto-scrolling and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Threat: Presents a grid matrix of threat detection cells showing attack vectors (Phishing, Malware, DDoS, Zero-Day) across categories (Email, Network, Application, Endpoint) with color-coded severity levels and active threat indicators that update every 5 seconds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/VoiceP: Displays a timeline visualization of speaker voice patterns with segments showing speaker activity, volume, and duration over a 5-minute period. Includes interactive segment selection and real-time playback indicator.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Route guard component that checks Internet Identity authentication status and redirects unauthenticated users to login. Shows loading spinner during initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleProtect: Role-based route guard that verifies user permissions (admin or user) and redirects unauthorized users to dashboard with error toast. Handles loading and error states during role verification.
frontend/src/components/common/ActiveSta: Displays an animated green pulsing dot with tooltip indicating active status.
frontend/src/components/common/HotkeysRe: Modal dialog displaying categorized keyboard shortcuts with search functionality, triggered by '?' key. Shows shortcuts for security protocols, privacy features, system commands, and navigation.
frontend/src/components/common/MetricCar: Reusable card component for displaying metrics with title, value, icon, and optional trend indicator (up/down arrow with percentage).
frontend/src/components/common/PrimaryCT: Styled primary call-to-action button with emerald gradient, hover effects, and shadow animations.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Active: Card displaying the user's current subscription plan (Sovereign Enterprise) with crown icon and plan description.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Contro: Dashboard control panel with three toggleable features (Neural Shield, Stealth Mode, AI Detection) that persist to sessionStorage and log telemetry events on toggle.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Global: Animated canvas visualization showing global node locations (NYC, London, Tokyo) with pulsing emerald dots and labels on a dark background.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Overvi: Displays a system overview dashboard card with security health KPI, network stats (active sessions, neural efficiency), and team access metrics (team members, threats), each with trend indicators.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TeamMa: Manages team members with a list view showing name, email, and status, allowing access revocation with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TeamSt: Displays a simple card showing team member names with active/idle status indicators using colored dots.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Teleme: Shows a scrollable feed of telemetry events from TelemetryContext with timestamps and color-coded event types (success, warning, error).
frontend/src/components/dev/PerformanceO: Displays a toggleable FPS counter overlay (Ctrl+Shift+F) that measures and shows frame rate with color-coded performance indicators.
frontend/src/components/effects/BorderBe: Renders an animated gradient border beam effect that travels diagonally across a container using CSS animations.
frontend/src/components/effects/Sovereig: Displays a 3D rotating orb with radial gradient, glow effects, and ripple animations on hover for neural core visualization.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorBoun: React error boundary component that catches errors and displays a fallback UI with error details and recovery options (try again or go home).
frontend/src/components/layout/BentoCard: Reusable card wrapper component with glassmorphism styling and optional animated border beam effect.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, user profile display, navigation items (command center, security, team, pricing, settings), and logout functionality with Internet Identity integration.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component with AXON branding, navigation links organized into Product/Resources/Legal sections, and social media icons. Includes copyright notice and company tagline.
frontend/src/components/MagneticButton.t: Button component with magnetic attraction effect that translates based on mouse position when hovered using custom useMousePosition hook.
frontend/src/components/mobile/Biometric: Mobile biometric authentication component supporting fingerprint and face ID scanning modes with animated progress indicators, haptic feedback, and simulated success/error states.
frontend/src/components/neural/AIMirrorS: Status display component showing whether the AI voice twin (Neural Proxy) is ready or in standby mode with appropriate icons and messaging.
frontend/src/components/neural/NeuralPro: Circular progress indicator with SVG-based animated ring showing synthesis progress percentage with gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/neural/VocalDrop: Drag-and-drop file upload component for audio files with visual feedback, file validation, and display of uploaded audio file details.
frontend/src/components/neural/VoiceHeal: Dashboard displaying voice quality metrics (Pitch Stability, Clarity Index, Tone Quality) with progress bars and icons in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/scheduling/Secur: Calendar-based booking interface for scheduling security audit calls with date picker, time slot selection, and confirmation functionality.
frontend/src/components/security/DarkWeb: Real-time dark web threat monitoring dashboard with auto-generated threats, filtering by type/severity, severity statistics, and CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Environ: Audio environment mixer with volume sliders for eight different ambient sound environments (office, rain, cafe, etc.) for tactical audio masking.
Displays a grid of environment audio spoofing options (office, cafe, airport, etc.) with thumbnail images and play/stop controls to simulate different background audio environments.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/Hardwar: Provides buttons to trigger fake OS update screens (Windows 11, macOS) in fullscreen overlay mode with a close button.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PacketJ: Slider-based UI to simulate network packet jitter and audio degradation, displaying quality, latency, and packet loss metrics with a keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+L) to activate lag simulation.
frontend/src/components/sentinel/PanicPr: Full-screen fake Windows update overlay with progress bar that can be dismissed via Ctrl+Shift+Q keyboard shortcut; stores panic state in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/components/settings/Bandwid: Bandwidth quality selector with four presets (low, medium, high, ultra) showing live usage meter, estimated bandwidth, and savings percentage; persists selection to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/sync/ConnectionL: Scrollable terminal-style log display showing WebSocket connection events with timestamps, simulating periodic heartbeat and authentication messages.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Tes: Reusable card component displaying user testimonials with avatar, name, title, 5-star rating, and quote text.
frontend/src/components/transitions/Neur: Full-screen loading transition with AXON logo, progress bar, and animated scan line effect that completes at 100% and calls onComplete callback.
frontend/src/components/transitions/Page: Simple wrapper component that applies a fade-in animation to its children for page transitions.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoWelco: Floating video widget in bottom-right corner with play/pause controls, minimize/maximize functionality, and close button; displays operator briefing thumbnail with simulated playback progress.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Netwo: A 3D globe visualization using Three.js that displays network latency between global nodes with color-coded connections and animated rotation.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Neura: A canvas-based audio wave visualizer that renders animated sinusoidal waveforms in real-time with multiple overlapping frequency patterns.
frontend/src/components/visualizer/Water: A waterfall-style spectrogram visualizer that displays frequency analysis as scrolling vertical bars with intensity-based coloring.
frontend/src/contexts/GhostModeContext.t: React context provider for managing ghost mode state with sessionStorage persistence and toggle functionality.
frontend/src/contexts/TelemetryContext.t: React context provider for logging and managing telemetry events with type classification and a 50-event history limit.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages ICP actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handles actor lifecycle, and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHapticFeedback.ts: Custom hook providing haptic feedback utilities with light, medium, and heavy vibration patterns using the Navigator Vibration API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardShortcut.t: Custom hook that registers keyboard shortcut listeners with support for modifier keys and prevents default behavior when shortcuts are triggered.
frontend/src/hooks/useMousePosition.ts: Custom hook that tracks mouse position relative to a referenced element's center point.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for managing user profiles, roles, meeting logs, panic events, and audit logs with ICP actor integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for a dark theme with emerald accents, plus utility classes for blur effects and fade-in animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabs for user management, audit logs, and system health monitoring; displays current user profile and includes a note that full user listing requires backend implementation.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsVault.tsx: Displays a grid of encrypted meeting logs fetched from backend; shows loading skeletons or empty state when no meetings exist.
frontend/src/pages/CommandCenter.tsx: Main dashboard page with a responsive grid layout containing Overview, ControlPanel, TelemetryFeed, GlobalNodeMap, and TeamManagement components.
frontend/src/pages/DeviceSync.tsx: Device pairing page that displays a QR code for mobile synchronization and a connection log for tracking paired devices.
frontend/src/pages/DevMetrics.tsx: Developer metrics dashboard showing system health including cycles balance, heap/stable memory usage with line charts, and critical threshold alerts.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, security features showcase, testimonials, and CTAs directing users to login for a sovereign trial.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Authentication page that handles Internet Identity login flow with session management and redirects to command center on success.
frontend/src/pages/MobileBiometric.tsx: Mobile-specific page for biometric authentication with back navigation to the remote control interface.
frontend/src/pages/NeuralLab.tsx: Neural Lab page with vocal sample upload, voice synthesis controls, progress tracking, voice health dashboard, and AI mirror status display using a bento grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/SentinelProtocol.tsx: Sentinel Protocol page featuring emergency panic mode, environment mixer, spoofing controls, packet jitter simulator, and hardware mimicry with tactical HUD background.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page containing bandwidth optimizer component for performance tuning.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Empty signup page file with no content.
frontend/src/pages/Subscriptions.tsx: Subscriptions page displaying Basic (₹299/month) and Premium (₹499/month) pricing tiers with feature lists and simulated subscription flow.
frontend/src/pages/TacticalRemote.tsx: Mobile tactical remote interface with large touch buttons for panic mode, lag simulation, environment spoofing, and biometric scanning with haptic feedback.
frontend/src/utils/localStorageAuth.ts: Empty authentication utility file with no content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter utilities for extracting, persisting, and clearing parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom OKLCH color system, sidebar theming, emerald accent colors, custom animations, and typography/container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking sidebar visibility issue in DashboardLayout with Deep Onyx background and Emerald accents, marked as fix request.
